body_html:
Thank you for this @psycharo - I had the same issue when building (using newer version, so different line numbers):

bazel-out/host/bin/external/org_tensorflow/tensorflow/swig: line 25: swig: command not found

Thought it might be helpful to point out that the same solution (for r0.10) is to insert
use_default_shell_env=True,

at
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r0.10/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl#L483

body:
Thank you for this @psycharo - I had the same issue when building (using newer version, so different line numbers):

`bazel-out/host/bin/external/org_tensorflow/tensorflow/swig: line 25: swig: command not found`

Thought it might be helpful to point out that the same solution (for r0.10) is to insert
`use_default_shell_env=True,`

at
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r0.10/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl#L483
